name: Dirty Cop
summary:
A new drug hits the city, you partner is murdered and now you are the prime suspect, will you keep yourself clean, or will you go dirty like everyone else? You choose.

A mix between Hotline Miami and a cop thriller. You are a police officer that through his investigation will have moral choices to make, you can either arrest the suspects, or get high* on their supply while you execute them point blank, the choices you make will change the ending and how you play.
